Key Match Events: Mavericks missed five of their last six shots in the final minutes
Steph Curry scored the final 12 points including a crucial three-pointer
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Doncic mentioned the team is still adjusting to the new lineup
Jason Kidd highlighted the game as a great test and noted improvements
Miscellaneous Highlights: Quentin Grimes had a strong performance with six points and six rebounds
